communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. ALPR Camera Locations: The precise locations of all Flock Safety ALPR cameras deployed and utilized by the Boulder County Sheriff's Office.
2. Contracts and Financial Records: Copies of any contracts, agreements, invoices, or purchase orders between the Boulder County Sheriff's Office and Flock Safety.
3. Email Communications: All email correspondence between the Boulder County Sheriff's Office and Flock Safety from July 1, 2021, to the present.
4. Data-Sharing Agreements: A list of all agencies with whom the Boulder County Sheriff's Office shares ALPR data, including in-state, out-of-state, and federal entities.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

William Freeman

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

A 21-year-old transgender man, Camdyn Rider, was shot and killed by his fiance on July 21, 2023 in Winter Haven, Florida. 

-Initial incident report, including crime scene notes and narrative description
-Chronological record of events
-Property and evidence log(s)
-Arrest reports
-Witness list
-Autopsy report and any medical examiner notes
-Interview notes from detectives who investigated the death, as well as any
photos and videos included in the case file
-Press releases and public communications regarding the case, such as flyers
and electronic community outreach
-Search warrant affidavits
-Case summary
-Charges recommended to prosecuting agency.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Kate Reese

title: NASA Return to Office Implementation plan

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: NASA Return to Office Implementation plan
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. any Return to Office (RTO) Implementation plan(s) submitted by NASA to OPM and/or OMB in response to the January 20, 2025, Presidential Memorandum (PM) "Return to In-Person Work" and its implementing guidance
2. any subsequent communications between NASA and OPM and/or OMB regarding the review/approval/disapproval of NASA's RTO implementation plan(s)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

William James Cawley
